plot: To replace Gwen's new laptop, Ben enters a pro-wrestling tournament for its prize money but encounters two competitors with problems greater than his own.

Rather than admit to Gwen he broke her new computer, Ben sneaks out to compete in an all-night pro-wrestling event (as Four Arms) for its $10,000 prize money. He faces off against two mutant brothers, Gaterboy and Porcupine, who need that prize money to pay off a loan shark who's keeping their mother as a marker. For Ben, these issues challenge his usual selfishness and lack of responsibility: replace Gwen's computer to cover his misdeed or help the brothers save their mother and family farm.—statmanjeff
